amendment.description: Page 22, line 14, insert "in each subject being assessed" after "student". Page 22, line 15, insert, "alternate academic achievement" before "standards". ***.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the McMorris Rodgers amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. McMorris Rodgers.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mrs. McMorris Rodgers.
